website_summaries.verdict: This 43" model has a reasonable screen size and saves you money over larger sets.
pros: The art screen includes a brightness sensor to make your viewing optimal throughout the day
The art turns on by a motion sensor, allowing the TV to turn off and save energy when you are not at home
You can use your phone as the TV remote
cons: TV comes with pre-installed apps that can't be uninstalled

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing color inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I'll update my review if this is just an issue where I got a defective screen but the color across this screen is very uneven. You can see a distinct greenish band across the middle of the screen about one foot wide. The rest of the screen isn't very even colored either. I've reached out waiting to hear if this is a fixable issue. If not I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: PenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Samsung frame tv is the ultimate pc monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great for computer monitor—very nice and clean/minimalist design. The screen image quality is second to none. Purchased the 2018 43” samsung frame. Easy to mount and set up. Plan to add a couple pieces of art on wall to further blend in.
customer_reviews.author: Vol Fan

customer_reviews.title: A mess!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Now I have to go through the pain of sending it back. What a mess. Known problem with Samsung. One connect box and cord are usually the issue. Now Samsung wants to send a tech out but that is so messed up with schedules you can’t flow it. Support is reading from a script and can’t help. They won’t send out a new one connect box either.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Sieg

customer_reviews.title: The frame TV is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Speechless. This TV is beautiful. We ordered the 65 inch tv. We hid everything behind the TV in the wall and the TV sits flush on the wall. I couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted, a tv that doesnt look like a tv. Super expensive but there is nothing else like it so they own the market. So far it's been great, the only thing that I dont like is sometimes it randomly goes to a black screensaver with the samsung logo bouncing around, and also sometimes the painting turns off even though we are in the room and moving about and have it set to high motion sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how flat the tv sits against the wall. The picture quality is great. All of my guests have been unable to tell that it is a tv at first and are always surprised when I pull out the remote. The tv comes with a free one-month art subscription to all the art pieces in the Samsung store. I covered up the “invisible cord” with another picture and my entertainment center. The contractor from Amazon who installed the tv mount hadn’t done it for the Frame before, so he took his time and watch a few how to videos. He was professional and polite.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Rose

customer_reviews.title: love the TV and the custom photo upload
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this TV. We upload our own photos to the TV to show on the picture frame setting. It would be nice if the TV was able to cycle through a number of pictures like a regular digital picture frame. The TV sits flush to the wall and the picture quality is really good too. The TV's remote is very simplistic and because of the lack of buttons it takes some getting used to accessing the different features.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: This Was the Perfect tv for about 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This was the best tv... After one short year my tv developed banding lines on the bottom of the screen. They are present on all sources including the picture mode. This is pretty disappointing for a purchase of this cost. Below is my old review: this is the best tv / non tv ever! We love that when this is off it’s art. The sensors match color temperature as well as brightness and I never have to adjust it, it always looks pretty convincing.
customer_reviews.author: SeanReynoldsCS

customer_reviews.title: It’s a work of art . . .
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this and was thrilled with the amazon installer. Blends into the wall with all the other framed prints. It is such fun to change the paintings.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing and highly recommended. Only issue that I have had with it is sometimes NETFLIX has loading issues and it needs to be restarted. However, we use Apple TV for our streaming services. Viewing angle is great, but keep in mind this TV is designed to be flush on the wall, looks great for sure!!! Just be mindful of viewing angle and glare in bright rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great compromise on a bedroom tv
customer_reviews.text: I ama ‘no tv in the bedroom’ person but I work nights and my partner likes to go to sleep to the tv. We compromised and got this. We have the 43 inch. The pictures is great. We love the art. The smart tv functions don’t have all the apps we like so we have a streaming device. Love the no gap mount. BE AWARE though that drywall anchors are not included with the 43 inch. And the mount is not wide enough to put on 2 studs. For the cost I would expect all materials to be included. We tried our own,professionally edited pix but didn’t love them in there. Purchased an art stone subscription.
customer_reviews.author: christine zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but nice
customer_reviews.text: Tv is nice. It should have a mirror function, eg camara. It should allow you to add a frame to your pics. Sound is very good lotsa bass Samsung trying to bring you a quality product. Any deal if I purchase more of them????
customer_reviews.author: Martin johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Best television I have owned. Picture and sound is great. The one connect box is really nice not to have all the input connections showing . The ART MODE is fantastic, looks like a piece of art hanging on the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Everything Works it is SIMPLE!
customer_reviews.text: Everything works out of the box! Even if you are not technical you can use this tv. Attach the tv flat on the wall - no gap on the back and then to your wifi and you're done. If you're like me you might not like the seeing the tv on the wall, this is why I got the Samsung 4k Frame Smart TV. It will disappear in Artmod on the wall and TV HDR picture is the solid Samsung experience. It did not take long for Voice Assistance to recognize my voice and it worked without a hitch. This TV is a great value and doubles as artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schanbaum

customer_reviews.title: It really looks like a framed art print.  Nice 4k image.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality 4k TV. The big selling point is the Art Mode. No more empty black square on wall. Many guests had no clue our family room framed print was actually a TV. One connect cord is an impressive piece of tech to complete to " un-TV" look. Samsung home screen/app navigation is clumsy, but that is a minor grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: You will need a place to put the smart hub box. It’s rather large so if you can carve out a spot behind the TV it’s ideal. Most people that come over comments on our art vs the TV! Good pic quality and sound. Wall mount is solid and included.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: This smart TV is more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this TV last week. It is amazing! I just bought a condo, and I wanted a nice TV to hang, and the frame gives it a lot of class. I currently have it on a stand, but will hang it after I'm done painting. If you're like me, you only use a TV for Netflix, YouTube and other apps. The "Smart View" app allows you to Bluetooth connect to your phone apps, which is all I need. And 55" is plenty big. I've already been binge watching shows, and it's great. There's also unique artwork you can modify when the screen is asleep. Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle47

customer_reviews.title: Great for a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: we wanted this to sit flush against a small wall and be discreet when not being used - it fit the bill perfectly - the sound though leaves a lot to be desired. the Bluetooth connectivity though allowed us to use a small speaker and make it bearable when not in art mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Mendell

customer_reviews.title: damaged frame
customer_reviews.text: A damaged frame - The tv itself is beautoful . It was only the frame that was damaged from what i can tell - a small damage to the outer frame - the shipping box was fine and the frame/tv itself was covered in styrofoam- so my guess is that it was damaged before it was packed for shipping .
customer_reviews.author: Bob's Art

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is superb.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for my photography. My wife has annexed in the name of trash television watching. The picture is wonderful - sadly all it does now is show chick flicks and bad TV reruns...
customer_reviews.author: Loren Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV for a room that needs decorations
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because every now and then I have to turn it of to rest the TV. It has locked up 2 time in the last couple months. That said, unplugging it fixed the problem. Other than that, I love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase all around.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Arrived in perfect condition. Easy to install, excellent directions, light weight, fun to download personal photos and see them on the large screen. Crisp picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nora K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful art mode!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first tv in 15 years. Smokes TVs have come a long way! The picture quality is incredible, the sound is more than sufficient for us, and the artwork mode is stunning. We love the fact that it doesn’t look like we have a tv in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Arrived perfect/undamaged and just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV! Looks like art on the wall. I had never had a TV shipped before, but was happily surprised at how well it was packed and that the delivery person carried it inside to the hallway for me. After professional installation, it is the best TV I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With the money if your going to use art mode
customer_reviews.text: Tv works good, easy to load photos onto for picture mode, brightness auto adjusts on photo mode to not look like a bright tv, apps work good most of the time, mounting was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Incredible design, exceptional instructions, beautiful on the wall. Great picture. Remote is sleek and intuitive. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: K. Francetich

customer_reviews.title: You have to have a monthly subscription for art images.
customer_reviews.text: You have to pay for the art images. Don’t waste your money on the additional frame.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McKee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with Sonos Beam.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing. Only complaint is I wanted the white frame to be pure white. It’s a warmer white. But other than that. It’s great with a white sonos beam.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN R JOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Junk TV
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Dead on Arrival. Junk TV. Samsung quality has gone way done in the years. Cheap quality and poor service. Skip this one and go with a better brand TV
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Faulty TV
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived. Professionally hung on wall. Turned on and half the picture was noticeably darker than the other. About five minutes later the upper left corner looked like something in the screen behind the class cracked.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stunning television
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful, thin and stylish television. Remote and menus, especially around the art selections can be confusing and cumbersome. Overall it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I have ever owned to date .. have been showing people pics of art mode they can’t believe it’s a TV
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Mason

customer_reviews.title: Turning off and on repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t even get through the set up because the tv turns off after about 30 seconds of being on then turns itself back on again. Beware of faulty tv stock!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful but the remote takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I've only 2 gripes with this product: 1:the free art gallery is not that large 2: The remote is a beautiful design and feels great in your hand but the Bixby voice feature is hit or miss. Also, why on earth is the channel button so counter-intuitive to use? I always want to push it up or down to scroll...and it does not work that way....maybe its just me.... The sound is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Dub girl

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and tech
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and is easy to setup and hang....took about 15 minutes. The picture is a solid 4k set. All in all it's a great flat screen and it's a nice piece of art.....and the remote is really pretty good too...one of the better universals I've used
customer_reviews.author: Phillip K Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great all around TV. Top notch quality across the board and very cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Love it other than the remote which is Samsung’s Achilles heal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love the TV and love the artwork
customer_reviews.text: The TV and the seemless connection to the services I use is great, but absolutely love the dual purpose as a beautiful work of art. It is perfectly at home above the mantel.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is flippin awesome. Ok, it’s more expensive than your average 4K but I’m a gadget lover and I think it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Art
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV/Wall Art. Many guest coming to our home can't believe that this is a TV. On our art images, we have adjusted the mat and image, so that it becomes a piece of artwork hanging in the room.
customer_reviews.author: c b dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Stunning in my living room
customer_reviews.text: Unable to link to sound system. Directions poor. Remote does not link to Fios remote at on.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for over fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Sits flush like at picture frame. Tons of art to choose from, I change art with my mood. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: custom photo option doesnt work!
customer_reviews.text: i am very frustrated that the option to load my own photos is not working. I have another frame tv and it worked very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV looks just like a picture on the wall and also a great TV
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: TV Dead Within Hours
customer_reviews.text: Within hours of installing this TV, the display stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot H.

customer_reviews.title: Cool TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Such a cool feature to have artwork when off.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I have made in a while
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I have made in a long time. The art mode is amazing and probably the future of televisions.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Best TV on the market for looks
customer_reviews.text: Hanging on the wall it looks like framed art, not a TV. Perfect for anyone that would like to hide their TV in plain sight.
customer_reviews.author: Danedoo

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for when the power is off. I love the art aspect to it. It has fooled everyone who has seen it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: TV was fairly easy to install and looks amazing! Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: robert peteson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this TV. Worth the money, we bought a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: Kismet House

customer_reviews.title: Issue with audio out
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use the optical audio out port to connect to our audio system/speaker and get very loud buzzing noise
customer_reviews.author: RNgRX

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the picture seems a bit pixeled but it really is a great TV
customer_reviews.author: Teri Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully hidden tv behind art
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone that doesn’t want to have a “tv” in the room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is truly amazing and a grand piece of art in our 1890 home.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Magro

customer_reviews.title: Very nice technology
customer_reviews.text: Great product and does it what it is explained to be.
customer_reviews.author: Brett M Santeusanio

product_meta.title: Samsung UN43LS03NAFXZA 43" Class The Frame Premium 4K UHD Smart TV (2018)
product_meta.description: Size:43-InchThe Frame is as much a work of art as it is a TV. With revolutionary Art Mode and the power of 4K UHD, the Frame transforms from TV to beautiful, lifelike art that fits seamlessly into your home and decor. Motion Rate: 120. Bring the beauty of art onto your screen and into any room. The choice is yours when it comes to The Frame. Pick the ideal customizable frame for your space, taste, or artwork-magnets make it simple to attach and detach for a different style (Each Customizable Frame sold separately). No matter the occasion, choose from a library of artwork to suit your mood. Discover an ever growing variety of art collections in the Samsung Art Store. Sign up for membership or purchase individual pieces through your Samsung account to display incredible pieces of art from popular artists and museum collections across the globe. Share life's favorite moments and upload your own photos. It's easy, just send your photos to The Frame via your smartphone, or connect your USB flash drive through the One Connect Box™. Make better use of your space with a single, One Invisible Connection™, and connect all devices without any messy tangled wires. One slim cable connects your power and video gear to the TV. Connects your components to one separate box, not to the back of the TV. Our No Gap Wall Mount, included with purchase of The Frame, means just that. The Frame hangs flush to the wall just like a real picture frame. It’s easy to tilt and adjust, and blends seamlessly with your decor. The Bixby intelligent assistant makes it easy to control your important devices in an intuitive and hands-free way. Bixby for the TV has been designed to enhance your entertainment experience, minimising your time spent navigating through menus and maximising your time with the shows you love.
feature_bullets: 4K UHD TV: See what you’ve been missing on a crisp, clear picture that’s 4X the resolution of Full HD. Product Size (W x H x D) Without Stand-38.1 x 21.9 x 1.7 inches. Screen Size-42.5 inch Measured Diagonally
Includes: No Gap Wall Mount, Optional Stand Support, remote control, power cable, user manual
Customizable Frame: Elevate your space and make The Frame your own by enhancing it with a frame in black, white, beige or walnut*.
One Invisible Connection: One slim cable combines your power and video gear into a single connection to the TV.
Dimensions: Without Stand 38.1" W x 21.9" H x 1.7" D | With Stand 38.1" W x 23.6" H x 7.9" D
Inputs/Outputs: Four HDMI ports, three USB ports, one Ethernet port, one RF input, one Digital Audio out, and one RS232C serial interface.
Art Store: Buy individual pieces or subscribe to an ever-increasing library of established and emerging artists’ work.

Art Mode: The Frame transforms into a beautiful work of art when you’re not watching TV. Activate the built-in motion sensor so whenever you walk into the room, your TV displays one of your favorite selections.

specifications.Special Features: Art Mode; One Invisible Connection; Customizable Frame; Smart TV with Bixby Voice; Premium UHD TV
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
